name: Cajun Turkey Burgers
ingredients: 1 medium tomato, seeded and diced, about 5 1/2 ounces

instructions.en: Mix the turkey, 1 tablespoon seasoning and tomato sauce. Shape into 4 patties.
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte morčacie mäso, 1 polievkovú lyžicu korenia a paradajkovú omáčku. Vytvarujte 4 fašírky.
instructions.ja: 七面鳥のひき肉、大さじ1のケイジャンシーズニング、トマトソースを混ぜます。4つのパティに成形します。

instructions.en: Heat a large nonstick skillet sprayed with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add the burgers and cook them about 5-6 minutes per side or until done to your liking.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte veľkú nepriľnavú panvicu postriekanú olejom na stredne vysokom ohni. Pridajte fašírky a smažte ich asi 5-6 minút z každej strany alebo kým nie sú hotové podľa vašej chuti.
instructions.ja: 大きな非粘着性フライパンに調理用スプレーをし、中高温で熱します。バーガーを加え、片面5〜6分程度、または好みの焼き加減になるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Meanwhile in another skillet, sauté the vegetables in the oil until tender.
instructions.sk: Medzitým v inej panvici opečte zeleninu na oleji, kým nezmäkne.
instructions.ja: その間に別のフライパンで、野菜が柔らかくなるまで油で炒めます。

instructions.en: Season vegetables with 1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning and salt and pepper, to taste.
instructions.sk: Ochuťte zeleninu 1 čajovou lyžičkou cajunského korenia a soľou a korením podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: 野菜に小さじ1のケイジャンシーズニング、塩、こしょうを好みで加えて味付けします。

instructions.en: Serve the vegetable mixture over the burgers.
instructions.ja: バーガーの上に野菜のミックスをのせて提供します。

notes: Makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. Badia Louisiana Cajun Hot Seasoning Blend was used for the Cajun seasoning.
